thumb.title: 日本の歴史秘話 元宿神社 武士から百姓へ
thumb.description: 元宿神社 足立区千住桜木一丁目１５番５号出典 FSA A1999.35 109 Kyoto Bullock carts.Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref148?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1332&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1339FSA A1999.35 136 Ferry at Kanazawa.Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref192?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=576&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=577FSA A1999.35 166 Atami Izu-san.Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref233?s=0&n=10&t=A&q=Atami&i=0Portrait of Samurai Officer in Costume, and Armor with Swords, Scabbards, and Bow.Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/naa.photolot.97/ref6780?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1764&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1770FSA A1999.35 001 [Priest reading].Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref6?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1200&n=12&t=D&q=japan&i=1204FSA A1999.35 170 [Man and bullock].Smithsonian Institutionhttps://sova.si.edu/record/fsa.a1999.35/ref240?f=online_media_type%3AImages&s=1200&n=12& 出典の続きはこちら https://youtu.be/esoJUpDEHDI
